website_summaries.verdict: A true timeless classic, the Samba Super, an upgrade to the Samba, from the Adidas Originals is a legendary indoor football trainer that’s updated to become an everyday, all-around version. This icon’s a real statement shoe that celebrates its history with an amazing design, comfort features, and upgraded tooling. It is guaranteed that the Samba Super has one of the most iconic styles that continues to stand the test of time.
pros: According to a great number of reviews, the Adidas Samba Super is an excellent classic sneaker that never gets outdated over the years
They are practically indestructible given their high standard quality
Heaps of users have mentioned that these Adidas sneakers are one of the most extremely comfortable trainers they have ever owned
As far as style is concerned, these shoes have it in abundance, based on a lot of shoe critics
This great all-around pair does not only look great but also feels great as well, as per several owners
Many commenters have stated that these well-made kicks are very reliable and are really durable
More than half of the buying public have claimed that the pair is totally a great value for money
Dozens of Adidas fans have remarked that the Adidas Samba Super is an iconic trainer that never disappoints
cons: A couple of pf users have noticed that these sneakers make the feet sweaty due to minimal ventilation
Many wish that the Samba Super come in more cooler colorways

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying at that price
customer_reviews.text: I have worn them less than a dozen times out of the house and they are falling apart, the white trim in falling off and the sole is also falling apart i have not used them for any sport or running and they are still falling this is not what i expected. These trainers should last longer than 5 months, as my last pair did
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase
customer_reviews.text: My husband always wears purchases this make of trainers and only wears them at weekends so normally will last a year or so this pair have fell apart after 5 weeks. Maybe copies not sure sure. Poor quality
customer_reviews.author: caroline j wallis

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: The king of the casual trainer in my opinion. Have an old pair that I've worn to destruction and was very pleased to find these on Amazon. The trainers arrived as advertised and was every bit the same as my old ones just brand spanking new. They are leather uppers which in a little time give to foot shape so are very comfortable. So a great trainer from a great supplier. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Gaz

customer_reviews.title: The go to trainer for me
customer_reviews.text: I own and have owned a few pairs of these bad boys. Virtually indestructable, comfortable and as far as style is concerned they have it in abundance. They go with everything and look as good today as when they came out in the 70s. A true classic that continues to stand the test of time. Samba supers are just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: craig

customer_reviews.title: The best indoor trainers ever
customer_reviews.text: I've had 4 pairs of Samba over the years, which speaks for itself. They are as good now as they have ever been. High quality, great shape and fit, the best looking footbal trainers ther are. CLASSIC!
customer_reviews.author: David M

customer_reviews.title: Great but only kids sizes
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of trainers, only returned them because they were too tight. I thought the size 5.5 may just fit a women's size 5.5, unfortunately it does not. I would say if you are buying for an adult go up a full size.
customer_reviews.author: Shev

customer_reviews.title: A personal favourite.
customer_reviews.text: Any review is always going to express a personal bias. In this case I am totally biased and that's why I only wear these trainers about 95% of the time. The other 5% I'm barefoot. Seriously always worth 5 Stars.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy. 29.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of it but they are not comfortable. When I step the top side is bending down on my foot to strong... Don't believe they are the genuine Adidas.
customer_reviews.author: Catalin

customer_reviews.title: A very good product.
customer_reviews.text: A very good product very strong, will definitely go for another one, I have used this product for all sorts of activity and it keeps going strong, will recommend this to all.
customer_reviews.author: Shark

customer_reviews.title: Great looking, tough to break in!
customer_reviews.text: I have to review this in two parts, firstly the trainers look great, and are just what I wanted, I don't think they are more fashion trainers than for playing football, with a glossy leather appearance. The problem I'm currently having is breaking them in, they're killing the backs of my heals, there is absolutely no padding at all at the back of the shore and the blisters pop up whenever I wear them, hopefully it wasn't last long once they broke in.
customer_reviews.author: Picknmix

customer_reviews.title: tatty box
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a present so don;t know about the fit and wear yet. Obviously a returned pair, stuffing had been taken out of one shoe, box tatty with a huge' bargain price' sticker badly ripped off. Too late to return for another pair before christmas tho
customer_reviews.author: J A HUSBANDS

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed because I've worn Samba for many, many years and have always bought UK Size 9.5. This time though they felt tight. Checking the label they were the right size but upon comparing them with my current pair they were noticeably smaller. On closer inspection the sole of the new ones was clearly shorter in length. Looked perhaps like a quality control issue and the shoes have the wrong label in them?
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Tom

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Looks great - a classic. But the foam and rubber peeled apart from the leather and I'm pretty vigilante about making sure I undo my laces properly and taking them off that way rather than prying them off my feet and flinging them across the room. So I was very disappointed to find this happened to them after only a month. Very disappointed :(
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Irvine-Naderali

customer_reviews.title: hope these are as good as the last pair
customer_reviews.text: I'm a grumpy old man who doesn't like change. These are to replace a pair I've had for 20 yrs. They are designed to be retro and they succeed. They are squarer at the toe than the originals. I cannot comment on the quality of the leather. The leather on my old pair is still excellent. some of the plastic parts have failed. Will report back if amazon ask me in 2,5 and 10 yrs.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Ansell

customer_reviews.title: 5  🌟 🌟 🌟 🌟  🌟  plus
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, I would buy them again and again and again, I keep wearing the same model for more than 9 years, highly recommend to everyone
customer_reviews.author: Florin tona

customer_reviews.title: I would Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Lovely trainer, def recommend. My husband uses this for outside football training and keeps his feet dry.
customer_reviews.author: Burbs52

customer_reviews.title: Bit of pricey nostalgia but worth it. One thing ...
customer_reviews.text: Bit of pricey nostalgia but worth it. One thing what is it about Adidas and sizes? Theses fit well but only because I knew to buy a size and a half above normal - so one star off.
customer_reviews.author: Red Ineire

customer_reviews.title: Tiny extremely narrow trainers. Sent back immediately.
customer_reviews.text: Useless. Tiny. Would only fit a person with extremely narrow feet. Sent them back immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Griffiths Clan

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product at a fair price topped off with some top class service, thank you I will definitely be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Where have you been?
customer_reviews.text: It was only by pure chance that I discovered that Adidas still made Sambas and as long as you remember to get the next size up you will not be disappointed. A fantastic shoe and like so many other reviewers it takes me back to the 70's when as a teenager I would wear nothing else on my feet. All these years that I have been struggling to find a pair of simple, comfortable, understated trainers that are not an embarrassment to wear in public and they were there all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Natatores

customer_reviews.title: Very happy Husband
customer_reviews.text: Husband's birthday present, he chose these because his old ones were wearing out which were the same as these. Good value for money and hard wearing. Very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Smith

customer_reviews.title: ... quicker than it said it would so i was happy with that
customer_reviews.text: I can't knock the delivery time because it came a lot quicker than it said it would so i was happy with that, however i am a sports coach and have worn these shoes for just under 2 weeks from Monday-Saturday and in that space of time the soal has come off on both shoes and the stitching has started to unravel on the one shoe meaning that i can no longer use the shoes, i am not happy at all for the wear and tear of the shoe and not being able to use them again in just 2 weeks!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love these trainers, they are so versatile and comfortable. I have been buying Samba's ever since they first hit the market, I forget how many pairs I have had but it's loads.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes, the only problem is that it says ‘Men’s Sambas’ - I’m female and love a Samba. But yea, Good quality and arrived quick.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hell for leather
customer_reviews.text: Great trainers but something unside the toe area of left shoe is sticking into my toe but i am unable to detect the offending piece. Put me off the shoes. I am back playing in my £20 pair of Nikes!
customer_reviews.author: william mckee

customer_reviews.title: Still a classic
customer_reviews.text: I have the same Samba trainers in blue suede - same size - that fit perfectly. These are a little snug for my liking, but I'm putting that down to being a) leather and b) brand new. I love them too much to care and they don't seem to do half-sizes.
customer_reviews.author: rakeem18

customer_reviews.title: Tissue leather
customer_reviews.text: Bought early for holidays ! Arrived cine checked left foot as in my case it's the bigger 1 . Fitted great. Packed . Gets to resort first out pulls out my brand new samba .I noticed little Mark on upper Had a look closer pressed and my finger went straight through the leather.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Best Training Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I’ve worn Samba trainers for many years and these are quality items.
customer_reviews.author: S D.

customer_reviews.title: 74 very much wasted.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered half a size down on my last pair from 5 years ago (11 down to 10.5). The new pair are in fact 6mm longer than the old pair yet they are 3mm narrower. Not entirely sure how you can make something for 30 years and have the size differ that much. £57.74 very much wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: To receive item on time
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with item and delivery time,wear them for comfort.
customer_reviews.author: David Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Box trashed.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know who is responsible but the box was trashed. Very poor if you're giving it as a gift and you like to keep your trainers in a box dont you think...
customer_reviews.author: M4444rk

customer_reviews.title: A classic shoe from yester year...and still fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service and delivery. Would highly recommend this seller.I have had many pairs of the 'Adidas samba or black mamba as I call them. Still a brilliant high quality trainer at a great price...not a shoe for label posers just a great and v comfortable trainer. may they reign for many years to come. Adidas, Five Nike, Nil... that's ZERO
customer_reviews.author: Angry man

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Well happy with my item I will be using again a credit to amazon Many thanks 👍👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Aj Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I think you know what I usually say at these times my dear friends ok 👍🏿 🙏🙏😀😃
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Mason

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: My partner loves these styles of trainers and choose these for Xmas he’s happy I’m happy
customer_reviews.author: Cinders

customer_reviews.title: Sizes are not correct
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size 10 which is normally just on the big side, these were very tight, I returned them and got a 10 and a half. still to tight. Returned them telling the retailer that their shoes sizing is not correct. Bought a size ten locally, plenty room. No refund for the 2 pairs returned.
customer_reviews.author: Steven J Macdonald

customer_reviews.title: never buy clothes or shoes online.
customer_reviews.text: Just the fact that you cannot try anything for size before you buy makes it not worth the hassle . I have been a size eight for all footwear for over forty years but my Addis samba size 8 were too tight so I need to repack and return them , they are still with me , just trying to get round to the hassle of returning them , and concerned that the eight and a half's won't fit. Surely more sensible to pop into a shop and leave with what you want !! Everything else has been spot on . Regards Ron.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the real thing
customer_reviews.text: Don't believe they are the genuine article have had due coming into my socks. I have a lot of trainers and won't be buying online again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Wardrobe essential
customer_reviews.text: Loved these the first time around . Look really smart with jeans
customer_reviews.author: jolew

customer_reviews.title: Not for normal feet.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a 1/2 size bigger but still very narrow. Had to send them back. Very disappointed as they looked great.
customer_reviews.author: ranger7

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Sole coming away from shoe after wearing a handful of times!
customer_reviews.author: argu

customer_reviews.title: So for the price i think they are a great buy.
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for my Brother and he loves them, this is his 3rd pair of these and he just loves them for home use, He says they are very comfy and they never hurt his feet or toes, So for the price i think they are a great buy.

customer_reviews.title: Trainers
customer_reviews.text: Great product arrived before it was due very good quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good quality item
customer_reviews.text: excellents shoes,good quality item ,very strong shoes and nice addidas shoes,the shoes was as the seller described,higth quality item,and very strong addidas shoes

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in damaged condition.
customer_reviews.text: When the product arrived they had already been worn previously, tags ripped off and the box was in awful condition. They were a Christmas gift and I work away so was unable to return the product in time. Really not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kye Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Well recommended! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Trainers,normally 7 but ordered 7.5 because adidas run small and they fit perfectly.Very quick delivery! Very comfortable so I'm a happy Chappy!

customer_reviews.title: Extremely happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy with my purchase, been looking for these trainers for a while now. They were delivered very quickly, earlier than the estimated date. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: tyronne61

customer_reviews.title: Best trainers for me
customer_reviews.text: Always been great trainers these, recommend to all , delivered on time ,good price,I'm a wide footed size 10 and these 10,s fit like a glove. As they are leather upper they will loosen up after a while of wearing them.......
customer_reviews.author: Leo s

customer_reviews.title: Too small..!
customer_reviews.text: Very narrow shoe, it's a shame I didn't see the other reviews before I bought them. They look nice enough but they (size 8) are way to small for my normal size 8 feet.
customer_reviews.author: Mr S

customer_reviews.title: Fake trainers?
customer_reviews.text: These shoes I dare say aren’t even real, the patterns between the two shoes don’t even match. I’m pretty sure these are copies ordered from the east and sold for a profit. I’m 100% expecting a refund for these.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Allerton

customer_reviews.title: Trainers are fantastic quality. Sambas are timeless classics
customer_reviews.text: I say fit as expected,but adidas are always small for me so I order 1 size larger. Trainers are fantastic quality. Sambas are timeless classics. Package came on time too.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas L.

customer_reviews.title: Friendly on the phone excellent experience thank you.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent company to deal with, communication exceptional, my first pair of trainers where too tight, I asked for an exchange, I had no problem, good experience thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm leith

customer_reviews.title: Great, like wearing slippers!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing this type of footwear ever since I can remember and haven't found a more comfortable trainer than these. Great for out and about, and of course for indoor footsie. Shame they are never on sale or cheaper than £40+.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. J. Serra

customer_reviews.title: Mega fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of adidas samba my son ownes, and loves. I do not normally leave reviews and the reason i have left this one is due to the very fast delivery, next day from order and that was with the super saver delivery option 10 out of 10, very impressive.
customer_reviews.author: MRS A. REILLY

customer_reviews.title: When is a 10 not a 10?
customer_reviews.text: My feet are size 10. These are marked ‘10 UK’ They were way too small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and delivery
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in plenty of time for Christmas. Exactly what was described
customer_reviews.author: Jane Worthington

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size
customer_reviews.text: First sent wrong size, had to put 5 pound in box to change to right size, then cost me 10 pound posting, but they where as good as there word.
customer_reviews.author: Jayne Hernon

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: These were much tighter than where I usually get them from.
customer_reviews.author: LThompson

customer_reviews.title: Samba trainers cool.
customer_reviews.text: I already had these in blue suede, but wanted black leather ones aswell. Size 9 are a perfect fit for me, great with shorts or casual with jeans. Adidas Sambas are a real must have item for all sporty or casual guys. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: bazspark

customer_reviews.title: Bargain
customer_reviews.text: Absolute bargain. These are brand new trainers with tags. There is no official box but hey we throw that away......
customer_reviews.author: Tranquility

customer_reviews.title: Size bigger was just the job!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes - I'm a size nine, but before I bought them I read so many reviews recommending buying one size bigger.. so I bought a size ten! Glad I did as 10 was a perfect fit!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit. Good quality product as you would expect from Adidas. Competitive price. Very quick to despatch
customer_reviews.author: Booksmith

customer_reviews.title: Very nice trainers - my son has to wear leather shoes ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice trainers - my son has to wear leather shoes but leather trainers can be difficult to find so very pleased that these were available - went on my sons feet the day that they arrived and have not really left them yet. Very happy son - so happy Mom!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. K. O'Neill

customer_reviews.title: The trainers are excellent and very well made
customer_reviews.text: The trainers are excellent and very well made. The only downsides are that I ordered size 9 and they are slightly on the small side but still ok (typical Adidas and no 9.5 available). Delivery could have been quicker and less awkward.
customer_reviews.author: nmg

customer_reviews.title: about right!
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of walking and took it for a 10km to break into it. at one point, my small toe was beginning to hurt a little but I guess because the shoe was brand new. I will stick to size 10US next time. Overall, pretty good shoe
customer_reviews.author: Tic Toc

customer_reviews.title: Not disappointed 10/10 Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Comfy and the price is so good as well i usually stick to £20 trainers but i decided to give these a bash and i'm not disappointed
customer_reviews.author: atoM

customer_reviews.title: Loved it but it doesn't feet its declared size, too small :(
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe because overall it's nice and comfortable. I bought my normal size 8 UK and it's small, what disappointing me since I have carry out the return shipping. I'll re-order one size bigger 9 UK (not sure about a size yet, 8.5 UK or 9 UK, but based on feedbacks I'll order 9 UK) .
customer_reviews.author: Yakov

customer_reviews.title: Too loose fit,not had a reply from amazon or the seller
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had the same size product for years but for some reason these slip off

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit
customer_reviews.text: These boots are hard wearing, smart and comfortable- however we had to send back and order a size bigger than my husband would normally take- the sizing is a bit on the small side.
customer_reviews.author: harriett durrance

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the retro look, slight squeek from the tong rubbing hopfully this will stop with time...
customer_reviews.author: GARY UN

customer_reviews.title: These will last.
customer_reviews.text: I use them as everyday walking shoes. As such they are great. One tip for buyers: Try them out somewhere to be sure on the size.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Been wearing these for decades once worn in quality looking shoe CLASSIC

customer_reviews.text: A little bit smaller than expected but they fit OK as I'm usually a size 9....apart from that good value for money A++

customer_reviews.title: excellent if a little bit
customer_reviews.text: define me as a player!! excellent if a little bit retro

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these trainers even if they seem a fraction tighter on the width than previous purchases

customer_reviews.title: retro adidas trainers
customer_reviews.text: Wore these in my late teens early 20's in the 80's. I was pleased they are still available to buy. They fit comfortably, they are made of quality leather. I may not run around & play football anymore but I can wear these in my leisure & look the part!
customer_reviews.author: A. Moran

customer_reviews.title: Samba
customer_reviews.text: Husband favourite trainers so he was really pleased with them

customer_reviews.title: Black and white
customer_reviews.text: These are retro training shoes , I have had them for year after year since I was 20 years old, now I am 60 years old and they are still in style,perfect.

customer_reviews.title: Great but small made
customer_reviews.text: Love these trainers. Word of advice though, if you're a size 9 then get a 10, always go one size bigger. You'll be returning them if you don't

customer_reviews.title: Trainers
customer_reviews.text: Fronts were 2 different colours and box was sellotaped all over as it was ripped to bits

customer_reviews.title: Ordered black leather sambas and I have had the navy ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered black leather sambas and I have had the navy blue suede sambas delivered. Far from product description and far from what I was wanting.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good product adidas seem to be small fitting size 10 is really 9 / 9.5
customer_reviews.author: Steven Whiteley

customer_reviews.title: Good value excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is second time I have ordered these trainers. Good value excellent.
customer_reviews.author: MRS GRACE BAIN

customer_reviews.title: smart looking all round trainer
customer_reviews.text: Basic, smart looking all round trainer. Comfy. Practical, does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adidas Samba Trainers
customer_reviews.text: As an ex PE Teacher I wore Samba trainers for over 25 years for work, so disappointed that they took them off the market for several years once I had retired. So when they started to sell again, I had to buy a pair for nostalga. Not disappointed, and use them regurlarly. Find them comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: jhp

customer_reviews.title: As described but buy a size bigger than you are.
customer_reviews.text: Item as expected, read the reviews prior to purchasing and purchased the next size up, I am a size 8 and purchased a size 9 and perfect fit, the 8 would of been to small.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size down from what I really needed. They were happy and quick to offer me a refund or a larger size. I took the larger, they were local so I just popped in, nice guys nothing a problem. Yeah, I'll use them again.

customer_reviews.text: This is a Adidas classic, it fits perfectly and would recommend these trainers to anyone.

customer_reviews.title: Adidas samba style trainers are always good quality, but also come up small
customer_reviews.text: Adidas samba style trainers are always good quality, but also come up small. I am size 11 for all footwear, but these always come up a bit tight.

customer_reviews.title: Classics are always the best
customer_reviews.text: I know of a few people who have sworn by Adidas samba trainers for years for playing football in as well as for casual use but not until now have I owned a pair. The arch and heel support on these trainers are impeccable. A very comfortable, and in my opinion, stylish pair of trainers.
customer_reviews.author: Mathew

customer_reviews.title: Buy at least 0.5 size above your usual
customer_reviews.text: I always buy Samba but there’s something slightly different with these as they don’t stop squeaking. Ever.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Neil

customer_reviews.title: happy with them my husband said they were a bit ...
customer_reviews.text: happy with them my husband said they were a bit tight but he has big feet size 11 that's what I ordered but sure they will be ok once he has worn them a few time .but still like the Trainers good value

customer_reviews.title: Was initially very pleased with these trainers
customer_reviews.text: Was initially very pleased with these trainers. However, after less than three months' wear one of the trainers has split quite badly and they are no longer wearable. Not acceptable for a pair of trainers of this price.

customer_reviews.title: Great trainer.
customer_reviews.text: Great trainer but suggest you order one size bigger than you usually have as they are slightly smaller than usual.

customer_reviews.title: The product and process met my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with the product, the process and delivery

customer_reviews.text: I've had these trainers for a while now and i've used them for the gym and casual occasions. They still look emmaculate. You can wear them with joggers or jeans.

product_meta.title: adidas Men's Samba Super Fitness Shoes
product_meta.description: adidas Samba Super Leather Trainer in black. Lace up, embossed logo to heel & tongue, adidas 3 stripes at side, gum sole unitLeather Upper. Textile Inner. Synthetic sole
feature_bullets: Full grain leather to give you great support and comfort
Die-cut EVA for lightweight comfort and cushioning.
Non-marking Gum rubber sole heats up and grips the floor when playing on an indoor surface
